com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.servlet

Class NodeMetricsServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.servlet.ServletBase
          • com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.servlet.NodeMetricsServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class NodeMetricsServlet
extends ServletBase
    Stand-alone servlet that may be used for serving metrics information regarding this node (and possibly its peers as well)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
